isis.stitle: VT-365 Diesel Engine Diagnostics (2002) - DIAGNOSTIC TOOLS AND ACCESSORIES - Using Master Diagnostics (MD 32) - Opening A Session File

svcproc.title: Opening A Session File
svcproc.para: The session menu allows a previously setup session to be opened. International® has setup several diagnostic sessions. The desktop workspace will have all the needed Text View windows, trouble code windows, ATA bus, etc., already configured for use.

step1.para: Select Session and then Open from the drop down menu bar.
The Open Session File dialog box will appear. Click on one of the preconfigured sessions to highlight it, then select Open.

svcproc.para: The session will automatically be brought up. These windows are placed in an organized manner.
A session can be set up and saved. See the Master Diagnostics (MD) Software User's Manual for detailed instructions.
